name: circuit-ts
description: Library for simulating digital circuits and logic gates, providing a fluent interface for circuit design and analysis.

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.build:commonjs: rimraf lib && tsc --downlevelIteration --target es5 --outDir lib --module commonjs --declaration
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && tsc --target es6 --outDir es --module es6
